DEBUG_helptext: Debug mode flag. Prints debug info to serial.
PERFORMANCE_MODE_helptext: Disables all notification banners to reduce MIDI play lag
MIDI_NOTES_LIMIT_helptext: Maximum limit for MIDI notes. Change with care.
NAV_BUTTONS_POLL_S_helptext: Polling interval for navigation buttons in seconds.
BUTTON_HOLD_THRESH_S_helptext: Threshold duration for considering a button as held in seconds.
DBL_PRESS_THRESH_S_helptext: Threshold duration for considering a double press in seconds.
NOTIFICATION_THRESH_S_helptext: Threshold duration for displaying notifications in seconds.
